page.title: 10Health Services
page.content: There is no doctor in the area so people have to go to the{GENERAL {PRACTICE}practice in Cressage which is 1 mile away. Because it is in the countryside the Doctor has to give out the medicines from his{DISPENSARY.} This means acting as the chemist. The nearest{HOSPITAL}is the one at Wellington or there is a causalty department at Much Wenlock. For bad accident's the main hospital is at Shrewsbury which is 7-8 miles away. The nearest{DENTIST}for people in the area is at Telford although some people travel to Shrewsbury. In this block there are no centres for health care so people have to travel to the nearby towns to use the services of the Shrpshire Area Heath Authority.
